it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  it.unipr.ce.dsg.deus.core.Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllocableResource
public abstract class Resource
extends java.lang.Object

This class represent the generic resource associated to a node.

Author:
Matteo Agosti (agosti@ce.unipr.it), Michele Amoretti (michele.amoretti@unipr.it)

Field Detail

params

protected java.util.Properties params
Constructor Detail

Resource

public Resource(java.util.Properties params)
         throws InvalidParamsException
Class constructor that builds the resource with its minimal set of properties. Each implementing class should call the super constructor and immediately after invoke the initialize method to check that the resource parameters are correct.

Parameters:
params - the properties that will be handled by the resource.
Throws:
InvalidParamsException - if the given parameter are wrong.
Method Detail

initialize

public abstract void initialize()
                         throws InvalidParamsException
Provides the initialization of the resource according to the given parameters. This method should also perform a check on the parameters values.

Throws:
InvalidParamsException - if the parameters passed to the resource are wrong.

equals

public abstract boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Each extending class must implement the equals method.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
